file_content.text: Thanks again, Jedi.
Wow, I'm at the top of my game. And it's all thanks to... whatever you did.
Once this drink is finished, I'm gone. Hope I can run far enough.
Are you Benx? I need you to decrypt and transmit some data.
You're risking your neck in here, Jedi. Sobrik's Imperial now. Everywhere. Even in my head--ugh.
I'd love to help you, but Darth Lachris discovered how fast I work and--bang, I'm working for her.
Anything you know about Darth Lachris could be very helpful.
Can you access info about her?
Well, our president's sick, so she's doing his job. Good at giving orders. Bad temper.
Oh! And she wants to tear your heart out 'cause you cost her an apprentice.
Help me, and I'll protect you from Darth Lachris.
Don't be afraid.
You can't stay here forever, Jedi.
Any brave man would rather die than serve a Darth.
You should have refused.
Dying I could handle. Getting a shockprod in the eye? No.
Darth Lachris has my brain busy processing a data stream right now. If I stop to decrypt this... it's the shockprod.
My training taught me to manage multiple thoughts. That could be useful to you.
A Jedi technique might help.
I don't know. I might accidentally start unraveling the complexities of the universe or something... okay, I'll try it.
Close your eyes and listen. See your thoughts as moving lights in the darkness....
Wow. I feel--I think I could process two streams at once. Give me your data.
Your mind is already trained and powerful. You can see how to do both at once.
[Force Persuade] I will help.
I can... see it. It's so easy--two streams at once. I can do... anything in here. Quick, give me your data.
There. Decrypted, sent, and Darth Lachris is none the wiser.
I appreciate it, Jedi. Huh, maybe now I can get drunk and work at the same time.
Work is done here, Herald. Tai waits for us.
If you're quite finished enlightening him, can we go?
Work is done here, Herald. Tai waits for us.
And thus you prove that "changing his mind" isn't always a metaphor.
Defy me, and I guarantee you'll suffer right here. Now decrypt it.
Do it or face my anger.
Okay, all right! Hand it over.
Ugh... Screwed up Darth Lachris's data stream--but at least you got what you wanted, right, Jedi?
Work is done here, Herald. Tai waits for us.
Tai is waiting. Let's leave this ignominious little hole.
Quiet. Quiet! The noise in my head is very loud.
